mapper.select: SELECT chargeorder.id as id, chargeorder.title as title, user.name as userName, admin.name as adminName, house.position as housePosition, type.content as type, chargeorder.status as status, chargeorder.money as money, chargeorder.create_date as createDate from chargeorder,admin,house,type,user where chargeorder.user_id=user.id and (chargeorder.admin_id=admin.id and chargeorder.house_id=house.id and chargeorder.type_id=type.id) and (chargeorder.title like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or admin.name like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or user.name like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or house.position like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or type.content like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or chargeorder.status like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%')) ORDER BY chargeorder.update_date desc
mapper.update: update chargeorder set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
